import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './AboutPage.css'; function AboutPage() { const [glowPosition, setGlowPosition] = useState({ x: 0, y: 0 }); useEffect(() => { const handleMouseMove = (e) => { setGlowPosition({ x: e.clientX / window.innerWidth, y: e.clientY / window.innerHeight }); }; window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove); return () => window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove); }, []); return (

🧠 About FlashQuizApp

✨ What is FlashQuizApp?

FlashQuizApp is a clean, creative flashcard platform that lets you build your own brain-boosting quiz decks. Whether you're learning languages, history, or code — it's your memory's best sidekick.

🎮 How to Use

  • 🃏 Create cards with questions and answers.
  • 📊 Test yourself in quiz mode, track accuracy, and level up.
  • 🔒 All data is saved locally — it's yours.

👨‍💻 About the Creator

Hey, I'm Masrafi — a developer who builds things that feel good to use. This app blends aesthetic, interactivity, and learning psychology in one slick little tool.

🐙 GitHub 📘 Facebook 🌐 Portfolio

🧱 Tech Stack

  • ⚛️ ReactJS
  • 🎨 Custom CSS theming
  • 📦 LocalStorage for persistence
  • 🧠 Modular card engine with rank unlock logic

🚫 No accounts. No ads. No data collection. Just your brain vs your deck.

); } export default AboutPage;
